name: Jaws: Le Dernier Etalon
overview: In 1995, for unknown reasons, a virus invaded the hip world and decimated all the horses on the earth. All. except one: Jaws, the last stallion. You are Shana, a lovely creature who must capture this horse, hidden in the depths of Tibet. Without hesitation for a moment, you pack up in the direction of this distant land. You will meet a multitude of animals ranging from young monkeys to old bison, including crocodiles and snakes. In direct connection with meditation (which is still a local specialty), you will see a temple, monuments and other statues that will help you penetrate the depths of your soul. You will also meet Samantha Fox's doppelganger
